title: Is a Deceased Pope Tapped with a Silver Hammer to Verify He’s Dead?
subtitle: Legend holds that part of the process of determining that a pope has died is to call for him to be tapped on the forehead with a silver hammer.
author: Snopes Staff
vclaim: Part of the process of determining that a Pope has died and is not merely sleeping calls for him to be tapped on the forehead with a silver hammer.
